title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Sim Update 12 - first beta released
description:
In this video we will have a look what has changed in the first beta release of Sim Update 12 which will be released on the 21st of March, approximately a month from now. The update will bring a small set of new features but will mostly fix issues in multiple cockpits and aircrafts as well as some peripheral issues. 

The full list of fixes can be found via the link below:
https://forums.flightsimulator.com/t/sim-update-12-beta-release-notes-1-31-18-0/575707/1
